EmailTemplate.description: Money laundering at all-time high on management's agenda
EmailTemplate.name: Money Laundering 4-8-14
EmailTemplate.subject: Money laundering at all-time high on management's agenda
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Anti-money laundering concerns have climbed to an all-time high for senior management,and regulatory fines are now running in the billions of dollars, according to a recent study of AML professionals.
http://www.complianceweek.com/money-laundering-hits-all-time-high-on-managements-agenda-kpmg-survey-says/article/341027/
